name: oaks
title: Oaks Residences
subTitle: Inline with our vision to elevate the real estate market, OAKS Egypt New Capital took the field by storm and brought things to another level by being the very first branded residence in the New Capital that is not only introducing a brand-new concept to the sector, but it rather grants you the highest return on the investment.
description: Experience the ultimate luxury with Oaks Residences, offering modern design and unmatched amenities.
Located in the heart of the city, Oaks combines elegance with convenience.
ProgressDetails: The construction of Oaks Egypt in the New Capital is progressing steadily, reflecting a commitment to excellence at every step. From structural progress to refined finishing touches, Oaks Egypt is shaping up to be a standout destination in the heart of the New Capital. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to build a space designed for luxury and comfort.

description: Discover the future of urban living at Zia Tower.
